publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1431 Mr Tom McCabe on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: Approval of SSIs-That the Parliament agrees that the following Orders be approved: The draft Scotland Act 1998 (Transfer of Functions to the Scottish Ministers etc.) (No.2) Order 2000 and The draft Scotland Act 1998 (Modifications of Schedule 5) Order 2000 and The draft Scotland Act 1998 (Cross-Border Public Authorities) (Adaptation of Functions etc.) (No.2) Order 2000 and The Mink Keeping (Scotland) Order 2000 (SSI 2000/400) and The draft Welfare of Farmed Animals (Scotland) Regulations 2000. Supported by: Tavish Scott*
